Keywords: Animal , Savage Land , Scientist
Real Name: Herbert Edgar Wyndham
Special Powers
CREATOR OF THE ANI-MEN: If High Evolutionary is on an Animal themed team, your maximum number of Themed Team Probability Control uses this game is 6 (instead of 3).
MY ISOTOPE A CAN JUMPSTART THE NEXT STEP OF EVOLUTION: High Evolutionary may start the game with FFFF #s009 Isotope A equipped. When he uses it's EFFECT, he may target other characters with the Animal keyword (he may still use it to target himself as normal).
I HAVE GIVEN MY WORD - AND MY WORD IS MY BOND!: Leadership. When he uses it and succeeds, also remove an action token from another friendly character within range with the Animal keyword.
RELOCATE MY OPERATIONS: STOP. Super Senses. // When this click is first revealed, place High Evolutionary in any square on the map.
Figure Errata
Changed CREATOR OF THE ANI-MEN
Trade High Evolutionary Want High Evolutionary

Comments
March 15, 2022
Nekrun
This character cannot fly. He only has boot symbol
May 29, 2021
fastcat99
As backup to an animal theme team, he's nuts! Double perplex, defend, low cost, all of it in a really nice support package that lets your animals off the chain. Keep him behind the front line and watch your opponent struggle to keep up. I played him at 300, and the only (and I do really mean the only) problem I faced was the clock. He kept my team well defended with the defense while everyone got into position, then he started upping the attack values, but the clock ran out. Played him with Maggot, Wonder-Woman, Red Ghost (ape spawner), Ultra Humanite, against a bunch of lanterns. It took the entire game to get postioned to do some real serious damage when...bam! Time ran out. Man, that was one game I was ready to play all the way through to see what would happen. I usually stick with strict named keyword themes, but this one was so fun. I'm going to have to build some more around this guy, it was really fun.
April 9, 2021
Skeleman
He created one group of Ani-Men in a mid 90s Scarlet Spider series.
April 4, 2021
CoolJerk
Holmes here absolutely did NOT create the Ani-Men. He created the New Men, and it's sad that we spend so much money on a game that doesn't bother to use copy editors (or spend 90 seconds of online research).

This seems to be the depowered, human version of high evolutionary. Double perplex is fantastic, but this dial doesn't have enough teeth to take full advantage of warping anywhere on the map.

February 11, 2021
Goop
Wizkids eratta. New text: CREATOR OF THE ANI-MEN: If High Evolutionary is on an Animal themed team, your maximum number of Themed Team Probability Control uses this game is 6 (instead of 3). Its pretty cool he has 2 stop clicks at 40 pts and can bounce to ANYWHERE on the map. Other than that he's really just a fun piece for your animal team. With new 2021 rule change of how theme teams work he loses a lot of his luster.
